CommentBody: The customer wanted to focus on the issue related to the Action module. We used the time to work on ticket #00396923 because they don't want to upgrade until the other issue is resolved.
As requested, the customer submitted the Action folder for review.

Problem Statement/Business Impact:
Describe specifically what the customer is trying to accomplish.

The customer has an issue with the Action job. The error message was complaining about the database version when executing the Action.

Desired Outcome:
How should the results appear or be presented to the user?

What is the expected outcome?

The customer wants the Action to be executed without error.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. From the RollBack_Map_EO_P021, expend Configure, select Action, and click on Execute Action

2.  Or right-click on the RollBack_Map_EO_P021 job and click Run
3.


Reliably Repro'd in Customer Envi

Troubleshooting completed/Notes: 
1. Action Take
    a. Result
2.
    a.

We created a new job in the Sandbox folder
Create a new query
Under the Data Source tab, we selected Filesystem Access for the data collector.
We selected the option to remove scan executable data and assigned the host.
 
We run the job to remove the data, and when it is finished, we go to the Action and Execute Action and get the same error.
 
We collected the Action log folder.
We don't know what the outcome will be
We noticed the version was different

Ensure relevant logs are uploaded to SPO:
Application Logs
Please spin off a new ticket for the File System Action issue following the meeting on 30-7-2024

Prod issues with table, input and results versions 1 and 2, assumed dropping the tables completely and re-creating them might help.
